title: Drow Half-Elf
content:
y Ancestry: Advantage onSaving Throws against beingCharmed, and magic can't put you tosleep. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12m.

Drow Half-Elf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the High Half-Elf race used to feature +2 Charisma and another +2 Ability points of their choice. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose.
